posts.text: —title: 搭建hexodate: 2018-12-14 00:26:17tags: hexo 准备：安装node.js , git ；创建github账号； 1、github添加仓库 2、安装hexo打开gitbash输入命令 $ sudo npm install -g hexo-cli 初始化 创建一个文件夹存放博客，cd进入文件夹输入命令 $ hexo init 4、部署到GitHub安装git部署插件，输入命令 $ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 修改站点配置文件（_config.yml)（冒号后都有一个空格） deploy：type: git repo: (github地址） branch: master url:github地址 后台输入 hexo g 和 hexo d 说明：hexo s等同于hexo serve生成本地预览 hexo clean清除本地生成的文件 hexo g 等同于hexo generate生成最终的静态html文件 hexo d等同于hexo deploy部署到github

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
